meta.title: File Difference Checker - Free Online Comparison
meta.description: Compare two pieces of text or files to find differences and changes instantly.
meta.subtitle: Compare and contrast data seamlessly

content.hero_title: File Difference Checker - Compare Text & Code
content.hero_subtitle: Compare two text files or code snippets to find differences, additions, and deletions. Perfect for code reviews, document comparison, and version control.
content.p1: Our file difference checker (diff tool) helps you quickly identify changes between two versions of text, code, or documents. It highlights additions, deletions, and modifications line-by-line for easy comparison.

visual.title: Visual Comparison
visual.desc: Clearly see differences with color-coded highlighting for added and removed lines.

instant.title: Instant Results
instant.desc: Get immediate diff results as soon as you click compare, no waiting required.

privacy.title: Privacy Protected
privacy.desc: All processing happens in your browser. Your files and text are never sent to our servers.

unlimited.title: No Limits
unlimited.desc: Compare text of any length without page reloads or character restrictions.

accurate.title: Line-by-Line Accuracy
accurate.desc: Uses advanced algorithms to detect even the smallest changes between two versions.

free.title: 100% Free
free.desc: High-quality file comparison tool available at no cost, with no registration needed.

code.title: Code Review
code.desc: Compare code snippets to find bugs, review changes, or understand implementation differences.

document.title: Document Revisions
document.desc: Track changes between two versions of a document, contract, or article easily.

config.title: Configuration Files
config.desc: Spot differences in JSON, YAML, or .env files that might be causing system errors.

merge.title: Manual Merging
merge.desc: Review and merge changes from two different sources without complicated Git tools.

backup.title: Backup Verification
backup.desc: Ensure your backups are identical or identify what has changed since the last save.

translation.title: Translation Check
translation.desc: Compare original and translated text blocks to ensure structure and length consistency.

1.title: Paste Original Text
1.desc: Enter your base text or code into the 'Original Text' field on the left.

2.title: Paste Modified Text
2.desc: Enter the version you want to compare it against into the 'Modified Text' field on the right.

3.title: Click Compare
3.desc: Press the 'Compare Files' button to start the analysis process.

4.title: Review Differences
4.desc: See the results below. Green lines are added, red lines are removed, and gray lines are unchanged.

faq.a1: Absolutely. This tool runs entirely client-side using JavaScript. No data is ever transmitted to our servers or stored anywhere.
faq.a2: You can compare any plain text content, including source code (PHP, JS, Python), configuration files, and standard text documents.
faq.q3: Can it compare Word or PDF files?
faq.a3: Currently, you need to copy the text from those files and paste it here. We are working on direct file upload support.
faq.a4: The current version focuses on additions and deletions. Moved lines will show as a deletion in one place and an addition in another.
faq.a5: The only limit is your browser's memory. Most standard documents and code files will compare almost instantly.

js.error_empty: Please enter text in both fields to compare

content.about_desc: Lorem Ipsum is placeholder text used in the printing and typesetting industry since the 1500s. It's used to demonstrate the visual form of a document without relying on meaningful content.
content.p1: Generate Lorem Ipsum placeholder text for your designs, mockups, and prototypes. Choose between paragraphs, sentences, or words to get exactly the amount of dummy text you need.

faq.q1: How do I format Morse code input?
faq.a1: Separate each letter with a space. Use / for word spaces. Example: "... --- ..." for SOS.
faq.q2: What if I make a mistake?
faq.a2: Invalid Morse code patterns will be skipped. Make sure dots and dashes are separated by spaces.
faq.a3: Yes! The tool decodes numbers 0-9 from their Morse code patterns.
faq.a4: Use a forward slash (/) to separate words in Morse code.
faq.a5: Yes! Completely free with no limits. All processing happens in your browser for privacy.

faq.a1: The tool reverses the order of characters in your text. The last character becomes first, second-to-last becomes second, and so on.
faq.a2: Yes! All characters including spaces, punctuation, and special characters are preserved and reversed in order.
faq.a3: Yes! Simply paste the reversed text back into the input and reverse it again to get the original text.
faq.a4: Palindromes are words or phrases that read the same forwards and backwards, like "racecar" or "madam". Use this tool to test them!
faq.a5: Yes! Completely free with no limits. All processing happens in your browser for privacy and speed.

faq.a1: Morse code is a method of encoding text using dots (.) and dashes (-) to represent letters and numbers. It was invented in the 1830s for telegraph communication.
faq.q2: What does SOS mean in Morse code?
faq.a2: SOS is ... --- ... (three dots, three dashes, three dots). It's the international distress signal.
faq.a3: Yes! The tool supports numbers 0-9, each with its own Morse code pattern.
faq.q4: Is Morse code still used today?
faq.a4: Yes! It's still used in aviation, maritime communication, amateur radio, and as an accessibility tool.
faq.a5: Yes! Completely free with no limits. All processing happens in your browser for privacy.

meta.title: Word Counter Online - Free Character & Word Count
meta.description: Instantly count words, characters, and sentences with our free online tool. Perfect for writers, students, and SEO content creators.
meta.subtitle: Detailed text statistics at your fingertips

form.label: Enter or Paste Your Text
form.placeholder: Start typing or paste your text here to count words, characters, sentences, and more...

content.main_description: Count words, characters, sentences, and paragraphs instantly. Perfect for writers, students, and SEO professionals.
content.intro: Our word counter tool provides real-time statistics about your text including word count, character count, sentence count, reading time, and more. It's perfect for essays, articles, social media posts, and SEO content optimization.
content.feature1_desc: See word and character counts update instantly as you type or paste text.
content.feature2_desc: Calculate how long it takes to read your content based on average reading speed.
content.feature3_desc: Identify long and short sentences to improve readability and flow.
content.feature4_desc: Track character limits for meta descriptions, titles, and social media posts.
content.faq1_q: How accurate is the word count?
content.faq1_a: Our word counter uses industry-standard algorithms to count words accurately. It counts words separated by spaces and ignores extra whitespace, giving you precise results matching tools like Microsoft Word and Google Docs.
content.faq2_a: A sentence with more than 20 words is typically considered long. Long sentences can reduce readability, so our tool highlights them to help you improve your writing clarity.
content.faq3_a: Reading time is calculated based on an average reading speed of 200-250 words per minute for adults. This gives you an estimate of how long it takes to read your content.
